1004282756216606720.text: While seismologists may have excellent models to predict earthquakes, locals in seismic areas may possess even more precise insight due to their experience. Prediction markets aggregate those two sources of information and surface the likelihood of an earthquake #BUIDLwithGnosisXhttps://twitter.com/sciam/status/1002945496560885765 …

1003570556308946944.text: Within the scientific landscape, prediction markets have been used to assess the reproducibility of scientific research. They could also help to rate the pre-reproducibility and confirm that enough info is provided to allow researchers to repeat the experiments. #BUIDLwithGnosisXhttps://twitter.com/nature/status/1003325457348071425 …

956199857160642561.text:

956198665827348480.text: For all those who didn’t get a ticket for tonight’s #DEXMeetupBerlin:  Thankfully @FactoryBerlin will be live streaming!  Catch us on Facebook here  http://www.facebook.com/FactoryBrln/

953945581067669504.text: On a mission to ground and grow the emerging #blockchain community in Berlin with a physical space to work, collaborate, and experiment, we have joined forces with @cosmos/@tendermint_team to open @fullnode_berlin! #berlincryptocapitalhttps://blog.gnosis.pm/announcing-full-node-e77d8f95ec9b …

951109561406107648.text: We're super excited to announce that together with @cosmos, we'll be opening @fullnode_berlin, Europe's largest co-working space for blockchain companies! #BerlinCryptoCapitalhttps://venturebeat.com/2018/01/10/berlins-full-node-wants-to-be-europes-largest-blockchain-coworking-space/ …
